entry.title: Friday: Rain or snow. High 6.
entry.summary: Snow or rain changing to rain this morning. Local rainfall amount 15 mm. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 early this afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow mixed with rain. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow mixed with rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
